title: 249 Crooks #8 Upper with den
posting_body: Units come with updated kitchen, wood plank floors, an assigned parking spot per apartment.
This upper unit, also comes with a den.
Small dogs allowed, 35 lbs or less.
Our tenant portal makes everything so much simpler for you especially in your busy lifestyle.
You can create work orders at any time, sign digital leases any time, pay rent online any time, communicate with the office anytime.
We offer 12-month leases, application fee is $50 nonrefundable.
Centrally located so getting on to freeways, eating at the many local restaurants, shopping and entertainment are all close by.
Upgrades to the property - new parking lot in August.
New replacement windows have just been installed.
Bids on a new fence install will be coming next.
